author: Peggy Truong
title: Funniest Tweets About CeeLo Green's Gold Grammys Outfit - CeeLo Green Twitter Reactions
text:
19 of the Funniest Twitter Reactions to CeeLo Green's Gold Grammys Look 
I guess you should call him CeeLo Gold now. By Peggy Truong Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below CeeLo Green showed up to the 2017 Grammy Awards in head-to-toe gold. Did you miss him? I did too, because he looks like a Ferrero Rocher and now I want at least eight of those scrumptious chocolate treats. According to Vibe , CeeLo Green is now Gnarly Davidson, an alter ego that surfaced in December following his bizarre ( and fake ) exploding cellphone video episode. He also went as Gnarly (in all black) to a pre-Grammys party over the weekend: Getty Naturally, Twitter is having a field day with CeeLo's golden Grammys look. Here are the funniest reactions. 1. â€” Kev Rich (@kevantrich) February 13, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
